definition: gap/to separate/to thin out (seedlings)/to sow discontent
between/among/within a definite time or space/room/section of a room or lateral space between two pairs of pillars/classifier for rooms
to tread on/to trample/to stamp/to fulfill/Taiwan pr. [dao4]

sentences.english: The flesh-patting dance (Rou Lianxiang) in West part of Hubei is closely related to Buddhism.
sentences.chinese: 鄂西土家族民间舞蹈肉连响与佛教关系密切。

sentences.english: Consequently, horse images are found in folk dances on the pasture land.
sentences.chinese: 因此，草原文化型民间舞蹈中马的形象也最常见。

sentences.english: He is going to see folk dances.
It's a kind of Chinese folk dance, called the fan dance.
sentences.chinese: 这是一种中国民间舞蹈，名叫扇子舞。

sentences.english: The Irish tap dance has transformed folk dance into commercial performance successfully.
sentences.chinese: 《大河之舞》是爱尔兰民族民间舞蹈走向世界的开始。

sentences.english: Another well-known folk dance is the Yangge.
sentences.chinese: 另一种著名的民间舞蹈是秧歌。

sentences.english: Stick Dance (Jocul cu bâta), Romanian Folk Dances, for orchestra No. 1
sentences.chinese: 棍舞，为管弦乐队而作的罗马尼亚民间舞蹈第1首。

sentences.english: They will act out some folk dances.
sentences.chinese: 他们将表演一些民间舞蹈。

sentences.english: Yangge dance is a form of Chinese folk dance originating from the Song Dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 秧歌舞是一种源自宋朝的中国民间舞蹈。

sentences.english: They watched a Yan'an cultural troupe perform folk dances.
sentences.chinese: 他们观看了延安的一个文工团表演民间舞蹈。

sentences.english: Folk dances might incorporate moves from jazz or tap.
sentences.chinese: 民间舞蹈可能吸收爵士风格或踢踏舞的动作。

sentences.english: The military band played the national anthems of both countries and some Congolese people performed passionate folk dance.
sentences.chinese: 刚果民众表演了热情奔放的民间舞蹈。

sentences.english: The waltz originated in Germany from the energetic folk-dances of the country people.
sentences.chinese: 华尔兹起源于德国乡村人民热情欢快的民间舞蹈。

definition: Yangge, a popular rural folk dance
opera for popular in Sichuan and Yunnan
local Chinese opera, such as Shaoxing opera 越劇|越剧[Yue4 ju4], Sichuan opera 川劇|川剧[Chuan1 ju4], Henan opera 豫劇|豫剧[Yu4 ju4] etc
festival entertainment (lion dance, dragon lantern etc)
a rattle stick used in folk dancing/rattle stick dance
